mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book_review_replies (user_id, review_id, parent_reply_id, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{reviewId}, #{parentReplyId}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, review_id, parent_reply_id, content, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM book_review_replies WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at IS NULL
SELECT id, user_id, review_id, parent_reply_id, content, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM book_review_replies WHERE review_id = #{reviewId} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at ASC

SELECT id, user_id, review_id, parent_reply_id, content, created_at, updated_at, deleted_at FROM book_review_replies WHERE parent_reply_id = #{parentReplyId} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_review_replies WHERE review_id = #{reviewId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
